CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 2, 1947, pg. 5 reads: "In Political Race - Charles pg. Pernell (inset), printer, and a Democrat, is opposing the Rev. Cornell E. Talley (extreme right, upper photo), Republican, for the City Council in Pittsburgh's Fifth ward. Son of Indiana's GOP Legislator, the Rev. Marshall Talley, the Pittsburgh minister is pastor of Central Baptist Church, of which Mr. Pernell is a member and officer."
TitMainTitle: Rev. Cornell Talley wearing double breasted suit, standing at counter watching man wearing suspenders writing on tablet, posed in city office
